gen.long:
Creates a unique slime and replies to the user with it. This slime is now owned by the command user!
Cooldown: 15 minutes

view.long:
Usage: s!view <slime id>
Shows the slime corresponding to the given ID.

inv.long:
Usage: s!inv <optional: filter>
Shows a navigatable embed of every slime the user owns ordered by date acquired. The filter must be 7 characters long. A '.' in the filter means anything can be in that slot.
Cooldown: 2 minutes

trade.long:
Usage: s!trade <other user> <your slime> <their slime>.
Offers a trade for their slime given yours. If the receiver reacts with a checkmark the trade completes.
Cooldown: 1 minute

reset_self.long:
WARNING: Only do this with 100% certainty. There are no reversals.
Wipes all your slimes from the server and resets your account.
Cooldown: 24 hours
